description:
Welcome to Rivergum Drive…. Set amongst Burpengary's finest acreage, this home has a terrific family atmosphere. Owners have left no stone unturned. This stunning home has been given a new life with full renovations both inside and out. Artistically styled with light-filled living and dining areas, elegant fixtures, fittings and free flowing floor plan allowing for effortless living.

The amazing lifestyle offers the perfect marriage between inside and out, which complement the spacious outdoor alfresco area so that entertaining can be experienced with equal pleasure and ease.

9 Walnut Crt offers:
The home :
Spacious Open plan combined Living, Dining and Kitchen area
4 bedrooms:
Primary suite is an oasis of pure indulgence. Simply enjoy and relax in this oversized comfortable suite or rejuvenate in the stylish bathroom. Complete with mirrored custom built-in-robe
4th bedroom has its own ensuite bathroom and direct access to the garage perfect for teenager or extended family/guest. Also comes with A/C, ceiling fan and built-in robe.
The remaining 2 bedrooms offer A/C, ceiling fans and built-in robes
Main Bathroom is finished off with quality elegant fixtures
Study nook with built in shelving
The centre piece of the home is the lavish kitchen:
Brilliantly chef designed and centrally located in the home, the kitchen boasts enormous island bench stone tops and waterfall ends, with plenty of space that doubles as a breakfast bar and servery to the outdoor entertaining area, 900mm free standing gas cooker. PLUS plenty of cupboards and drawers all with soft closing, quality fixtures, tapware and sink. High-end quality appliances catering for any chef to prepare large dinners with ease.
Enjoy a nice vino or hot beverage around the indoor fire place during those winter nights
Expansive laundry with external access plenty of cupboard and bench space
The vehicle storage:
Remote double garage bonus retractable garage lockable screen door so you can capture the natural breezes. Plus A/C, ceiling fans and TV points
12 x 6m and 6 x 6m sheds plus carport
The grounds:
Manicured 3/4-acre (2997 square metres) allotment
Easy to maintain lush tropical garden with manicured lawns
Double gated access direct to sheds via Hauton Road
Genuine side access with electric powered gate
Plenty of room for a pool, tennis court or even a granny flat
Additional Features:
Generous alfresco outdoor entertaining area
Plantation shutters throughout
Fully fenced kids play gym
Privacy isn't an issue with fully fenced yard surrounded by tropical palms
Air-conditioning/ heating and ceiling fans throughout
Electric powered gate
Keep the electricity bills down with 10kw's of solar

With something for everyone, this prestige home offers comfort and style all under one roof.
Spoil your family, move into this true lifestyle property.
Homes of this quality don't come up often, and when they do they don't last long!
This amazing property is bound to excite so call, text or email Gavin Lomas today to arrange an inspection time.
